oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition Pennant Card
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: copyright by Leon Lewis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Appalachian Exposition Pennant Card. Postcard with green felt pennant with "Knoxville." Drawing a man with a parachute: "Have Landed Safely in Knoxville. Appalachian Exposition And I'm Having One Helluva Time." Pennant Card copyrighted by Leon Lewis. Lewis Publishing Co., Pittsburgh, Pa. Unused. 1910 or 1911. In Postcard Collection>Knoxville, TN> Chilhowee Park/Expositions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Pennants; Fairs;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
